enabled.description: If the channel is enabled for the bot (this config file must be in the data/bots/BOT_ID/config folder)

botToken.description: This is the value of "Bot User OAuth Access Token" on the page OAuth & Permissions

signingSecret.description: The value of Signing Secret on page Basic Information

fetchUserInfo.description:
Fetch or not the user information when receiving a message.
This uses caching for efficiency.

chatUserAuthDuration.description: The duration of the authentication session when a user authenticate through this channel.
